WorkItem.Description:
I am finding that the editor works well except that whenever I click a toolbar option I get the standard IE security message 'Are you sure you want to leave this page?'. Is there a way to prevent this? It means that every toolbar action displays this prompt! Direct editing of the text in jHtmlArea does not display the message.

I am running the editor within a SharePoint 2010 page (in edit mode) in IE11 .

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: IE 'sure you want to leave page' message displayed after toolbar action
